tool_description: A powerful API for scraping via different proxies, making a screenshot of a website, or getting the HTML of a JavaScript-rendered page.

api_list.name: JS Rendered Page
api_list.description: Retrieve the final HTML of a page with many JavaScript-rendered elements.

api_list.name: Website Screenshot
api_list.description: Capture a screenshot of a specified webpage.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The webpage URL to capture a screenshot of.

optional_parameters.name: screen_size
optional_parameters.description: Browser window size for the screenshot image.

api_list.name: POST/GET Request
api_list.description: Parse a web page using a simple request.
